entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [jitstress] HardwareIntrinsics_ro fails with "process cannot access the file" error #83298
  • Suboptimal struct zeroing in case of gc pointers #83297
    Future
  • Using CryptoStream leaves copy of unencrypted data in shared array pool after it has been encrypted #83295
  • Consider removing unnecessary AllowEmptyTelemetry task usage from Crossgen Targets #83290
  • GeneratedComInterface methods don't match Com ABI #83289
    8.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Investigate slow contexts in coreclr_tests #83258
  • [API Proposal]: Make common interface for Random #83304
  • System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingServices.LoadPrinterSettings NullReferenceException #28995
    Future
  • Use string resources in Unix System.Drawing.Common #23420
    Future
  • Conditional format specifier and negative zero #13712
    Future
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestChainTests.CreateChain_RSA #82693
    8.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Net.Mail, Version=6.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51'. The system cannot find the file specified. #79545
  • [Convert.FromHexString] The input is not a valid hex string as it contains a non-hex character. #79649
  • [API Proposal]: StringBuilder.IndexOf(string find, int start) #80060
  • [API Proposal]: Allow Lazy<T> to be invalidated #78770

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Remove lvaPInvokeFrameRegSaveVar #83309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Constant folding for RuntimeInformation.IsOSPlatform(OSPlatform) #83308
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove LclVarDsc::lvExactSize and LclVarDsc::lvSIMDType #83307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop relying on type handles in CSE #83306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Performance improvements for Random.Shuffle() #83305
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83303
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0][mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83302
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Override all write/flush methods on NullTextWriter #83293
    area-System.IO
  • Adding validation to SetHWIntrinsicId to help validate correctness #83292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Shared helpers for creating framework-dependent/self-contained apps in host tests #83291
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [mono] Clean up the delegate ctor code. #83288

Merged

  • JIT: Add a primitive to split statements at a specified tree #83005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid synchronizing access to TextWriter.Null in Console #83296
    area-System.Console
  • Reduce cost of async waiting on SemaphoreSlim with cancellation/timeout #83294
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Remove the second copy of ILLink.Shared project and source code #83263
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fold string fields in structs stored in static readonly fields #80431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Fix the variable name #83282
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Update usage of AllowEmptyTelemetry based on changes to the task in the SDK #82805
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.5

Updated

  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify unroll limits in a single entry point #83274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2133190 #83240
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Remove the support for non r4fp, its not used by any supported platforms. #82005
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83273
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce duplicity in GVM analysis #83250
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Convert JIT\Directed tests to merged test groups #83256
    test-enhancement
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Rename VirtualMethodTableManagedImplementation and add manual CCW to test generated RCW #83285
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix marshaller types in attributes for exception marshallers and fix non-generic managed type with generic marshaller cases #80461
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Print the state when the align instructions don't match up #83286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
